title: shootout: glib-2.0 error messages
body:
Linux Mint 13

$ uname -a
Linux M13 3.2.0-23-generic #36-Ubuntu SMP Tue Apr 10 20:39:51 UTC 2012 x86_64 x86_64
x86_64 GNU/Linux

$ hg id
f33da81baac2

$ ./all.bash
. . .
# ../test/bench/shootout
fasta
reverse-complement
nbody
binary-tree
binary-tree-freelist
fannkuch
fannkuch-parallel
regex-dna
regex-dna-parallel
spectral-norm
Package glib-2.0 was not found in the pkg-config search path.
Perhaps you should add the directory containing `glib-2.0.pc'
to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
No package 'glib-2.0' found
k-nucleotide
k-nucleotide-parallel
mandelbrot
meteor-contest
pidigits
threadring
chameneosredux
. . .
Installed Go for linux/amd64 in /home/peter/go
Installed commands in /home/peter/go/bin

Revision f33da81baac2 generates the glib-2.0 error messages.
